document.heading: Tax Clarity and Recorder of Deeds Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-282, the “Tax Clarity and Recorder of Deeds Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-537, which was referred to Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 2, 2002, and October 1, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 22, 2003, it was assigned Act No. 14-616 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-282 became effective on April 4, 2003.
